description: [Telehash](http://telehash.org/) a new encrypted P2P JSON-based protocol enabling developers to quickly build apps that are distributed and private (see [v2](https://github.com/quartzjer/TeleHash/blob/master/org/v2.md) of the spec)
ohloh_description: A Kademlia-based DHT and JSON protocol for application meshing and eventing
name: Telehash
